snippet: A kindergartner was killed in his bed in Versailles before dawn Monday when a stranger from Indiana broke into his home, grabbed a kitchen knife and stabbed the boy multiple times, the police said.
abstract: Ronald Exantus faces murder and first-degree burglary charges after traveling from Indianapolis to Versailles, Ky, stabbing six-year-old Logan Tipton to death while he lay asleep in bed; Exantus, stranger to family, also injured two of boy's siblings.
lead_paragraph: A kindergartner was killed in his bed in Versailles before dawn Monday when a stranger from Indiana broke into his home, grabbed a kitchen knife and stabbed the boy multiple times, the police said.

headline.main: Kentucky: Intruder Fatally Stabs 6-Year-Old in Bed
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Intruder Fatally Stabs 6-Year-Old in Bed
